srsPopover.title: How Spaced Repetition Works
srsPopover.explanation:
**New:** Cards you haven't seen yet.
**Learning:** Just introduced. You'll see these frequently.
**Reviewing:** You're getting the hang of it! Reviews are less frequent.
**Mastered:** You know this! Cards are shown rarely to lock them in long-term memory.
